iti92:2.1: “Sanghatikanne cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetva pitthito pitthito anubandho assa pade padam nikkhipanto,
iti92:2.2: so ca hoti abhijjhalu kamesu tibbasarago byapannacitto padutthamanasankappo mutthassati asampajano asamahito vibbhantacitto pakatindriyo;
iti92:2.3: atha kho so arakava mayham, ahanca tassa.
iti92:2.5: Dhammanhi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati.
iti92:3.1: Yojanasate cepi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya.
iti92:3.2: So ca hoti anabhijjhalu kamesu na tibbasarago abyapannacitto apadutthamanasankappo upatthitassati sampajano samahito ekaggacitto samvutindriyo;
iti92:3.3: atha kho so santikeva mayham, ahanca tassa.
iti92:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
